channel.title: Wpe pro. a wow hack , would it work for runescape aswell?
channel.description:
well as im sure many of you are aware there is a hack for world of warcraft using the program "wpe pro" this let you use spells that you hadnt learnt and stuff like that. Now , this doesnt work on wow any more because blizzard got pissed off and now they have pretty heavy security, however , does rs have that kind of anti-hack security? im pretty sure it doesnt. Now i tried this out and i managed to edit a few random things for example when i ate a kebab (on real rs this is btw) it would say OMG ITS A KEBAB, rather than : that was a good kebab, you feel alot better. However i didnt manage to change any big important things. There was one thing though. I managed to edit the stats that it showed when i clicked "view stats" now I couldnt find the correct code for the strength stat but im pretty sure that it is out there and well, here is a link to a tut on using wpe pro for world of warcraft. :
[url=http://www.hsforum.net/index.php?showtopic=5190]http://www.hsforum.net/index.php?showtopic=5190[/url]
Please can one of the decent coders out there look into this? or if its been tried and failed before please notify me.
Thanks, Dr J

item.title: Wpe pro. a wow hack , would it work for runescape aswell?
item.dc:creator: @alowaniak alowaniak
item.description:
@alowaniak wrote:

if(ilyCouldRead)
{
hisText = “Private Servers are coded by us(non-blizzard)”;
}

he said: at least on wow private servers. not: at least on rs private servers

Read full topic
item.source: Wpe pro. a wow hack , would it work for runescape aswell?

item.title: Wpe pro. a wow hack , would it work for runescape aswell?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Dr Jekkyl:

its, true, at least on wow private servers. I wasnt using it when it oculd be used on real ones but other peeps say it was true, anyways im gonnna stop bumping this topic now cos i got the answer i needed

Private Servers != Real Servers
Private Servers are coded by us (non-Jaguarex) members. We can make 'em do whatever we want. JaguarSex made em with 100’s of less glitches. Remember, don’t believe the MoparScape nebs

Read full topic

item.source: Wpe pro. a wow hack , would it work for runescape aswell?

item.title: Wpe pro. a wow hack , would it work for runescape aswell?
item.dc:creator: @k00dr k00dr
item.description:
@k00dr wrote:

sup000:

unfortunatly, wpe pro can only edit values client side, the real info is stored server side which cant be changed with the mentioned program. Wpe is a very popular memory editor, widely spoken about in rs cheating, as probaby like many other online games!

Actually, WPE is not a memory editor, it’s a packet sniffer.

If you (jekkyl) are really serious about being able to do spells that you’re not supposed to be able to do, in WoW,
then Blizzard doesn’t know shit about coding a secure server, unlike Jagex.

Read full topic
item.source: Wpe pro. a wow hack , would it work for runescape aswell?

item.title: Wpe pro. a wow hack , would it work for runescape aswell?
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

unfortunatly, wpe pro can only edit values client side, the real info is stored server side which cant be changed with the mentioned program. Wpe is a very popular memory editor, widely spoken about in rs cheating, as probaby like many other online games!

Another popluar version is ArtMoney, which if you search on the forum you will probably find many topics on it I am sure all of your possible questions will be answered in those topics!

EDIT: i meant to say thanks for the WoW link ;D i had to do it :o it was reduced in Woolworths!
